title: Update Mineral Water M.R.P. to ₹20

requirements.text: Update the existing menu item named "Mineral Water" in `frontend/src/data/menuData.ts` so its displayed price reflects an M.R.P. of ₹20 (i.e., the price badge for "Mineral Water" must show ₹20 in the UI and in global search results).
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/data/menuData.ts`, the item with `name: "Mineral Water"` is updated so the rendered price badge for that item shows ₹20.
On the /menu page, searching for "Mineral Water" shows the item with a price badge displaying ₹20.
On the /search page, searching for "Mineral Water" returns a menu result whose badge displays ₹20.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other immutable frontend paths defined by the system context.
nonGoals: No other menu items, categories, descriptions, styling, or layout changes.
